snippet: Despite a recent string of weaker-than-expected results from companies, stock indexes and the bond market rose as investors anticipated the resolution of the 2012 presidential election.
abstract: Stock market climbs as investors look forward to a resolution to drawn out race for the White House.
lead_paragraph: Despite a recent string of weaker-than-expected results from companies, stock indexes and the bond market rose as investors anticipated the resolution of the 2012 presidential election.

headline.seo: Stock Market Climbs as Campaign Nears Its End
headline.main: Market Climbs as Campaign Nears Its End
headline.print_headline: Market Climbs as Campaign Nears Its End
